mapper.select: select a.no, a.title, a.contents, a.reg_date as regDate, a.g_no as gNo, a.o_no as oNo, a.depth, a.hit, b.no as userNo, b.name as userName from board a, user b where a.user_no = b.no order by a.g_no desc , a.o_no asc limit #{limit} offset #{offset};

select a.no, a.title, a.contents, a.reg_date as regDate, a.o_no as oNo, a.depth, a.hit, b.no as userNo, b.name as userName from board a, user b where a.user_no = b.no and (a.title like #{title} or a.contents like #{contents}) order by a.g_no desc , a.o_no asc limit #{limit} offset
select a.no, a.title, a.contents, a.reg_date as regDate, a.hit, a.g_no as gNo, a.o_no as oNo, a.depth, b.no as userNo, b.name as userName from board a, user b where a.user_no = b.no and a.no = #{no}
mapper.insert:
insert into board(title, contents, reg_date, hit, g_no, o_no, depth, user_no) values(#{title}, #{contents}, now(), #{hit}, #{gNo}, #{oNo}, #{depth}, #{userNo})
select last_insert_id() from dual
mapper.update: update board set o_no = o_no + 1 where g_no = #{gNo} and o_no > #{oNo}
